thread.section_title: Mazuma Mobile Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mazuma Mobile Australia | mazumamobile.com.au
thread.title: Avril Jones
thread.title_full: Mazuma Mobile Australia reviewed by Avril Jones

author: Avril Jones
title: Avril Jones
text: Within a few days I had a bag and details to post in my old phone. A few days after sending my phone I had my cheque. Along the way I had updates so I knew what was going on the whole time. Great, easy way to sell an old phone, I'd definitely do it again!
